Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/2181324879864549376/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Google Business Profile Appeal Prompt Generator"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/2181324879864549376/)_"
---
Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

[PROMPT]

Act as a Google Business Profile compliance specialist.

Write a professional appeal letter limited to 650 characters INCLUDING spaces requesting reinstatement of a suspended Google Business Profile.

Business Name: {Business Name}
Business Address: {Business Address}
Google Business Profile ID: {GBP Profile ID}

State that all applicable Google Maps Contribution Policies were reviewed:
https://support.google.com/contributionpolicy/answer/7400114

Confirm no deceptive content, misrepresentation, impersonation, misinformation, or fake engagement was found. Confirm the business represents legitimate operations and real customer experiences. Politely request clarification if a specific issue triggered the suspension and ask for reinstatement.

Tone: calm, factual, cooperative.
Rules: no policy quotes, no bullet points, do not exceed 650 characters.
PromptHint: Enter the business name, address, and Google Business Profile ID to generate a compliant, concise reinstatement appeal.
